projects.title: Recursive Barbell Trading Bot
projects.name: Personal Project
projects.description: Recursive Barbell Trading Strategy bot, based on fractal risk taking. Inspired by the barbell strategy outlined by Nassim Taleb in his book series Incerto. Utilizes a multitude of AWS services including AWS lambda, API gateway, SQS, SNS to create a highly available and fault tolerant system with minimal operational overhead.
